allocate(bytes,address).details: The encoded '_data' will be determined by the strategy implementation. Only 'Allo' contract can      call this when it is initialized.

params._data: The data to use to allocate to the recipient

distribute(address[],bytes,address).details: The encoded '_data' will be determined by the strategy implementation. Only 'Allo' contract can      call this when it is initialized.

params._data: The data to use to distribute to the recipients

getPayouts(address[],bytes[]).details: The encoded '_data' will be determined by the strategy implementation.

params._data: The data to use to get the payout summary for the recipients

returns._0: The payout summary for the recipients

increasePoolAmount(uint256).details: Increases the 'poolAmount' by '_amount'. Only 'Allo' contract can call this.

params._amount: The amount to increase the pool by

params._data: The initialization data for the strategy

returns._0: 'true' if the pool is active, otherwise 'false'

isValidAllocator(address).details: How the allocator is determined is up to the strategy implementation.

params._allocator: The address to check if it is a valid allocator for the strategy.

returns._0: 'true' if the address is a valid allocator, 'false' otherwise

registerRecipient(bytes,address).details: Registers a recipient and returns the ID of the recipient. The encoded '_data' will be determined by the      strategy implementation. Only 'Allo' contract can call this when it is initialized.

params._data: The data to use to register the recipient

reviewRecipients(address[],uint8[]).details: You can review multiple recipients at once or just one. This can only be called by a pool manager and      only during active registration.

params._allocationEndTime: The end time for the allocation
params._allocationStartTime: The start time for the allocation
params._registrationEndTime: The end time for the registration
params._registrationStartTime: The start time for the registration

allocators(address).notice: The details of the allocator are returned using their address

getPayouts(address[],bytes[]).notice: Gets the payout summary for recipients.

getRecipientStatus(address).notice: Getter for the status of a recipient.

isPoolActive().notice: Getter for whether or not the pool is active.

isValidAllocator(address).notice: Checks if the '_allocator' is a valid allocator.

metadataRequired().notice: Whether or not the strategy requires metadata

paidOut(address).notice: Returns whether or not the recipient has been paid out using their ID

recipients(address).notice: The details of the recipient are returned using their ID

registrationStartTime().notice: The start and end times for registrations and allocations

registryGating().notice: Whether or not the strategy is using registry gating

reviewThreshold().notice: The number of votes required to review a recipient

totalRecipientVotes().notice: The total number of votes cast for all recipients

updatePoolTimestamps(uint64,uint64,uint6.notice: Set the start and end dates for the pool

documentation.text: @notice The total number of votes cast for all recipients
@notice The number of votes required to review a recipient

@notice The start and end times for registrations and allocations
 @dev The values will be in milliseconds since the epoch
@notice Whether or not the strategy is using registry gating
@notice Whether or not the strategy requires metadata
@notice The registry contract

@notice The details of the recipient are returned using their ID
 @dev recipientId => Recipient

@notice The details of the allocator are returned using their address
 @dev allocator address => Allocator

@notice Returns whether or not the recipient has been paid out using their ID
 @dev recipientId => paid out

@notice Modifier to check if the registration is active
 @dev Reverts if the registration is not active

@notice Modifier to check if the allocation is active
 @dev Reverts if the allocation is not active

@notice Modifier to check if the allocation has ended
 @dev Reverts if the allocation has not ended

@notice Get recipient status
 @param _recipientId Id of the recipient

@notice Checks if a pool is active or not
 @return Whether the pool is active or not

@notice Check if the registration is active
 @dev Reverts if the registration is not active

@notice Check if the allocation is active
 @dev Reverts if the allocation is not active

@notice Check if the allocation has ended
 @dev Reverts if the allocation has not ended

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (address,bytes memory) view returns (struct IStrategy.PayoutSummary memory)
function (uint256) view external returns (struct IAllo.Pool memory)
function (address) view external returns (struct IRegistry.Profile memory)
